name: Halloween2019
description:
Story:

It's Halloween, the night where evil comes out to roam the night and haunt many a poor boy...

But you don't have time for that, you need candy, isn't that all you need in life? Candy is the literal force that keeps you going in life, so yeah, go knock on everybody's door and use your son as an excuse to be going out on Halloween.

Of course, Halloween is about the spooky time, and hey maybe you will find that along your quest to get as much candy as you can? Go knock on everybody's door until your hands begin to hurt and see if you can be the champion of candy collecting!

You never know what's on the other side of that door you know...

Credits:

Programming - SeventyFour Productions

Music - Bro. Three

Graphics - Bro. Three and SeventyFour Productions

Testing - Minefe

Direct3D Clickteam Effects - Looki

Sound Effects from freesound.org

Made by Nithriotto Games 2019.
